name: Iartol [Visual Novel] Chapter 1
description:
Welcome to the series of Iartol Visual Novels! CHAPTER 1 - "THE BEGINNING"

English Title: The Beginning

Iqlxldie Title: Acad

Version: 1.0

Password for Entry: None

This is the very first Iartol visual novel! Set in the Tmaks J]i Esefial star system, this series introduces the planet of Iar and the world of Iartol. Each chapter is a short, interactive experience. Have fun! Controls: WASD - Move X - Continue Space - Jump

Download for PC, Mac, or Linux!
